verbs.description: [ARG0: Trump] [V: says] [ARG1: that Pompeo , who is likely to be confirmed today as secretary of state , talked with Kim for more than an hour during a clandestine visit to Pyongyang earlier this month] .

Trump says that [ARG1: Pompeo] , [R-ARG1: who] [V: is] [ARG2: likely to be confirmed today as secretary of state] , talked with Kim for more than an hour during a clandestine visit to Pyongyang earlier this month .
Trump says that Pompeo , who is likely to [V: be] confirmed today as secretary of state , talked with Kim for more than an hour during a clandestine visit to Pyongyang earlier this month .

Trump says that Pompeo , [ARG1: who] is likely to be [V: confirmed] [ARGM-TMP: today] [ARGM-PRD: as secretary of state] , talked with Kim for more than an hour during a clandestine visit to Pyongyang earlier this month .

Trump says that [ARG0: Pompeo , who is likely to be confirmed today as secretary of state] , [V: talked] [ARG2: with Kim] [ARGM-TMP: for more than an hour] [ARGM-TMP: during a clandestine visit to Pyongyang earlier this month] .
